p: Moreover, bronchial epithelial cells of atopic asthmatics have shown to have increased RV replication, deficient IFN-Î³ release, and enhanced cell lysis [ 83]. Studies with omalizumab, anti-IgE, have shown that neutralizing IgE-mediated inflammation can enhance IFN responses and reduce virus-induced asthma exacerbations in children [ 84]. This finding suggests that neutralizing IgE indirectly improve anti-viral responses.
